name: Boi the Bear
description: $BOI THE BEAR — So good you can’t ignore! Welcome to BOI, the most hyped and energetic project on Avalanche. More than just a meme coin, BOI is a movement driven by unstoppable community power and vibrant culture. With multiple innovative projects already lined up, BOI is set to shake up the crypto space. Get in early, stay for the wild ride — BOI is only just getting started. Big things ahead!!!
